definition: (of e.g. closets or refrigerators) extending very far enough back to allow a person to enter, a small room large enough to admit entrance
details:
adjective
- (of e.g. closets or refrigerators) extending very far enough back to allow a person to enter
noun
- a small room large enough to admit entrance
- an assured victory (especially in an election)
= synonyms: waltz
- an operative who initiates his own defection (usually to a hostile country) for political asylum
- person who walks in without having an appointment
= example: person who walks in without having an appointment
